title: Elon Musk’s xAI launches Grok-Code-Fast-1, a free agentic coding model to rival OpenAI and Microsoft
description: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI is moving into the coding space. On Thursday, the company released a new agentic coding model called grok-code-fast-1, a tool it describes as “speedy and economical.” The release marks xAI’s push into one of the most competitive frontiers in AI: building assistants that can write and manage code. The

title: Dell Raises Annual Forecasts on Strong Demand for AI Servers
description: Dell Technologies Inc. boosted its annual outlook and posted quarterly sales and profit that topped analysts’ estimates, building on continued strong demand for artificial intelligence servers that power an expanding fleet of data centers.

title: Frequent use of AI may hinder students' academic performance
description: Marina Lepp, associate professor of informatics at the University of Tartu Institute of Computer Science, together with co-author Joosep Kaimre, a recently graduated master's student, examined in a research article the impact of artificial intelligence tools on students' academic outcomes. A total of 231 students took part in the study.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Nvidia's AI Momentum Propels Wall Street's Record Highs
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
